physical_appearance: This is a kebaya top. It is made from a light fabric with a printed recurring motif of foliage and small flowers.
sgcool_label_text: This kebaya is made from a light fabric printed with a recurring motif of foliage and small flowers. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_1: folk costume flowers (motifs) foliage (motif) Peranakan tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments)
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Motifs Peranakan (Asian people) Blouses
